source.b2c821e0:
df_1 = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/model-melanoma-2020/submission.csv')
df_2a = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/model-metadata-melanoma-2020/submission_best_mean.csv')
df_2b = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/model-metadata-melanoma-2020/submission_ensemble_mean.csv')
df_2c = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/model-metadata-melanoma-2020/submission_weighted_ensemble_mean.csv')

df_3a = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/melanoma-effnet-metdata/blended_effnets.csv')
df_3b = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/melanoma-effnet-metdata/ensembled.csv')
df_4 = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/minmax-melanoma-9619/submission.csv')
df_5 = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/melanoma-2020-9648/submission_9648.csv')
source.5f5d159f:
df_submission1 = df_1.copy()
df_submission1['target'] = 0.41 * df_1['target'] + 0.04 * df_2c['target'] + 0.55 * df_3b['target']
source.91b6cf43:
df_submission2 = df_1.copy()
df_submission2['target'] = 0.075 * df_1['target'] + 0.1 * df_3b['target'] + 0.375 * df_4['target'] + 0.45 * df_5['target']
source.a8dcd1e1:
df_submission4 = df_1.copy()
df_submission4['target'] = 0.3 * df_1['target'] + 0.1 * df_2b['target'] + 0.3 * df_3b['target'] + 0.3 * df_4['target']
source.0aa84f56:
* With private LB result, can conclude "ensemble of ensemble" isn't always better option
* `submission1.csv` and `submission2.csv` created before competition ended. All other submission file is created after competition ended.

| Filename | Public LB | Private LB |
| --- | --- | --- |
| submission1.csv | 0.9579 | **0.9369** |
| submission2.csv | **0.9658** | 0.9306 |
| submission3.csv | 0.9497 | 0.9293 |
| submission4.csv | 0.9610 | 0.9397 |
source.6029c252:
My simple ensemble use `csv` file from these following notebooks

1. [Stratified KFold with TFRecords & GridMask](https://www.kaggle.com/ilosvigil/stratified-kfold-with-tfrecords-gridmask) which is forked from [Triple Stratified KFold with TFRecords](https://www.kaggle.com/cdeotte/triple-stratified-kfold-with-tfrecords)
2. [Stratified KFold on Metadata (LightGBM)](https://www.kaggle.com/ilosvigil/stratified-kfold-on-metadata-lightgbm)
3. [Analysis of Melanoma Metadata and EffNet Ensemble](https://www.kaggle.com/datafan07/analysis-of-melanoma-metadata-and-effnet-ensemble)
4. [MinMax highest public LB=.9619](https://www.kaggle.com/ajaykumar7778/fork-of-ensemble-melanoma-ac9964?scriptVersionId=40334623)
5. https://www.kaggle.com/mekhdigakhramanian/top-7-lb-0-9648-post-processing (removed)
